posts.post_content: Looking to purchase beater t206 cards.  The more well-loved the better.

Looking for more extremely beat cards.  Also looking for beater quality SL'ers, HOF'ers, an American Beauty backed card and a pink Chase.  Willing to pay up to 8 for commons and up to 25 for others.  Please respond via PM.  Thanks to those who have already!
Thanks for the responses.  Still looking!
